name: MLB.TV
description:
Unless specified, cases should be run on both handsets and tablets.

Terms:

Lite user:
- User who has NOT purchased app
- User who is NOT logged in
- User who is NOT logged in with an account entitled with TV Premium or At Bat entitlement

Paid user:
- User who has purchased or restored in-app purchase
- User who has logged in with an account entitled with TV Premium or At Bat entitlement

EPG: Electronic Program Guide (List of available game feeds)
